## Simulate Sources

Source signals are "standardized" in terms of center and scale.

```{r source}
N <- 1e3 + 1

s1 <- arima.sim(list(ar = c(0.3, 0.3)), N)
s2 <- arima.sim(list(ar = c(0.8, 0.1)), N)
s3 <- arima.sim(list(ar = c(-.3, 0.2)), N)

s <- ts(cbind(scale(s1), scale(s2), scale(s3)), start = -T)
# apply(s, 2, var) # should be 1
# apply(s, 2, mean) # should be 0
# plot(s)
```
